name: Ryan Jetlines Safety Demonstration - The Game
name_original: Ryan Jetlines Safety Demonstration - The Game
description:
Awesome safety show !
Control flight attendants in rhythm !
Make the captain proud !

At Ryan Jetlines, safety always comes first.

The safety demonstration transcript is available here:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1OLrJ9tB0q584VorB6e0lH80cpF5Ewudl4OC0dJRGPLw/...

Features:

-- Cinematics done with Microsoft notepad !!

-- A credits scene with chickens !

-- Tons of acheivements to unlock !

Air safety alliance GOLDEN award !

ISO 4307 - REV. A Compliant !
